"Story Quest Difficulty":
"【Story Quest Difficulty】

\u3000You can select a difficulty for Story Quests.
\u3000Regardless of what difficulty you choose,the story does not change.

\u3000「Easy」
\u3000\u3000Enemy levels are lower, allowing you to enjoy the story.
\u3000\u3000If you're curious about the next

\u3000「Normal」
\u3000\u3000Enemy levels are higher, and the boss is stronger.
\u3000\u3000While more difficult to clear, some may reward you with unique Titles."
